title: Retirement Stage 1
description: A retirement planner is a financial expert who assists individuals in preparing for a secure retirement. They offer tailored advice on savings, investments, and pension choices, ensuring clients can achieve their retirement goals. By crafting personalized retirement plans and providing sound financial guidance, retirement planners empower individuals to navigate their retirement years with financial stability and confidence.
